name: Odie Brought Mom Flowers
description:
Odie is a good boy.

Guide Odie as he climbs all the way home and help him collect flowers for his mom. 

Pink ones are her favorite.

Controls: 
movement: RIGHT & LEFT arrow keys

jumping: UP

collect flower: hold DOWN

All code, art, sound and music, gameplay and story made in two days by the master code breaker Psychedelia
